tool_description: Analyzes historical price data to identify trends, calculate statistics, and detect price patterns over specified time periods.

include_outliers.description: Whether to include outlier data points

min_data_points.description: Minimum data points required for analysis

error_messages: Insufficient data: Not enough price records found for the specified period and product.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date.
Invalid analysis type: Use combinations of [trend, volatility, statistics, patterns, forecasting].
Invalid aggregation period: Use one of [hourly, daily, weekly, monthly].
Product not found: No historical data exists for the specified product_id.
Date format error: Use ISO 8601 format for start_date and end_date.
usage: Specify product_id and date range for analysis. Choose analysis types and aggregation period based on your needs. Minimum 5 data points required.
